title: Language Education Assessment and Communication Strategy Improvement Course for Children with Intellectual Disabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Collaborative learning environment using digital devices, with a case analysis project on six children with intellectual disabilities.

learning_goals: Learners can apply assessment tools analyzing linguistic characteristics and communication strategies of children with intellectual disabilities.
Learners can develop classroom context management strategies for communication-focused lesson design.
Learners can collaborate with peer teachers through project-based learning to derive language education improvement plans.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
